mapper.select: SELECT sh.sale_history_id AS settlementHistoryId, sh.is_settled AS isSettled, sh.settled_at AS settledAt, sh.sale_amount AS saleAmount, sh.service_type AS serviceType, sh.service_id AS serviceId, sh.created_at AS createdAt, sh.updated_at AS updatedAt, sh.mentor_id AS mentorId FROM sale_history sh JOIN mentor m ON sh.mentor_id = m.mentor_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sale_history sh JOIN mentor m ON sh.mentor_id = m.mentor_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}
